function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of novel RNA viruses presenting a serious threat to global public health and disease control","Impact":"Potential widespread community infection and impact on essential services such as waste and wastewater management","Mitigation":"Enhance preparedness for pandemics and develop flexible response strategies for essential services","Technologies":"Advanced waste and wastewater management technologies with built-in flexibility and remote operation capabilities","People":"General public, essential service workers","Owner":"Health organizations, waste and wastewater management authorities"},{"Description":"Potential vulnerabilities in waste and wastewater management due to widespread community infection and quarantining","Impact":"Disruption of essential waste and wastewater management services","Mitigation":"Implement remote operation capabilities, develop contingency plans for staffing shortages, and enhance PPE protocols","Technologies":"Remote operation systems, predictive maintenance technologies, advanced PPE","People":"Essential service workers, quarantine staff","Owner":"Waste and wastewater management authorities, government agencies"}]}
